findSimilarImg

类 fastQuerying

  • java.lang.Object
    • findSimilarImg.fastQuerying

  • public class fastQuerying
extends java.lang.Object
    This class carries out the algorithm described in this paper
    这个类执行的是这个论文中的算法

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      fastQuerying()
      reads all the files under current dir and generate fqdata file
      读该目录下所有文件并且在此处生成fqdata文件
      fastQuerying(java.lang.String draftPath)
      传入图片路径在当前目录下寻找保存过的特征图然后比较计算
      Use a locally stored fqdata file to find similar images for the draft
      fastQuerying(java.lang.String draftPath, java.lang.String[] inputPaths)
      最强大的构造函数
      The most powerful constructor

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      读已有fqdata和args[0]比较 read existing fqdata and compare with args[0]
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> trimFiles(java.lang.String[] inputPaths)
      delete redundant paths and nonexistent paths.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • fastQuerying

        public fastQuerying(java.lang.String draftPath,
                    java.lang.String[] inputPaths)
        最强大的构造函数
        The most powerful constructor
        参数:
        draftPath - 跟别人比较的图片
        inputPaths - 用来和draft比较的图片路径/目录路径

      • fastQuerying

        public fastQuerying()
        reads all the files under current dir and generate fqdata file
        读该目录下所有文件并且在此处生成fqdata文件

      • fastQuerying

        public fastQuerying(java.lang.String draftPath)
        传入图片路径在当前目录下寻找保存过的特征图然后比较计算
        Use a locally stored fqdata file to find similar images for the draft
        参数:
        draftPath - 跟别人比较的图片

    • 方法详细资料

      • trimFiles

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> trimFiles(java.lang.String[] inputPaths)
        delete redundant paths and nonexistent paths.
        删除多余和不存在的路径
        示例:For example: 
        inputPaths: [F:/tmp/foo, F:/tmp/root2, F:/tmp/root/ignore-l3, F:/tmp/root/l2/ignore-l2-2/l2-2-1, F:/tmp/root/l2/l2-1, 
                F:/tmp/root/l2/ignore-l2-2/sc9.png, F:/tmp/root/l1/sc0.png, F:/tmp/root/l2/l2-1/sc0.png]
return: [F:/tmp/root2, F:/tmp/root/l2/l2-1, F:/tmp/root/l1/sc0.png]
        参数:
        inputPaths - 需要修剪的列表paths to trim
        返回:
        trimed paths

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        读已有fqdata和args[0]比较 read existing fqdata and compare with args[0]
        参数:
        args -
